item0.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item0.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 50% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Banshee's Veil
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

item3.name: Doran's Ring
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item4.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
item4.description:
120 Ability Power
  • Magical Opus: Increases your total Ability Power by 35%.

item5.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item5.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12% Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Unsealed Spellbook
perk0.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
perk0.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

item0.name: Hextech Rocketbelt

350 Health

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 50% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item1.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item1.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item3.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item3.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12% Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item4.name: Doran's Ring
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
70 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

item5.name: Oblivion Orb
item5.description:
30 Ability Power
  • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Aftershock
perk0.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
perk0.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)

item0.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item0.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 50% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

  • Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

perk0.name: Predator
perk0.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Enchants your boots with the active effect 'Predator.'

Gain increased Movement Speed, ramping up to 45% Movement Speed over 1.5 seconds, while chasing enemy champions. After ramping up, damaging attacks or abilities to champions end this effect, dealing 40-120 (+0.2 bonus AD)(+0.1 AP) bonus adaptive damage.

Cooldown: 90s-60s.

25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

item4.name: Dark Seal
item4.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item5.name: Control Ward
item5.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilties (198 - 99s cooldown).

perk0.name: Phase Rush
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
perk0.longDesc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Movement Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

Movement speed is increased to 40 - 60% for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

perk0.shortDesc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
perk0.longDesc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
